title: List of Boston Celtics head coaches
summary: The Boston Celtics are an American professional basketball team based in Boston. They play in the Atlantic Division of the Eastern Conference in the National Basketball Association (NBA). The team is owned by Wyc Grousbeck  with Brad Stevens as the general manager.[1] Founded in 1946, their 17 NBA championships are the most for any NBA franchise,[1] and their eight consecutive NBA championships from 1959 to 1966 represent the longest consecutive championship winning streak of any North American professional sports team to date. They play their home games in the TD Garden.[1]
